title: Exclusive: SK Hynix expects AI memory market to grow 30% a year to 2030
description: South Korea's SK Hynix forecasts that the market for a specialized form of memory chip designed for artificial intelligence will grow 30% a year until 2030, a senior executive said in an interview with Reuters.

title: Nvidia China H20 chips
description: Nvidia pushed back Sunday in response to allegations from Chinese state media that its H20 artificial intelligence chips are a national security risk for China.
content:

title: Investors Flee Companies Seen as Most at Risk From Artificial Intelligence
description: Investors are exhibiting growing concerns over the potential upheaval caused by AI in various sectors.
content:
Investors are exhibiting growing concerns over the potential upheaval caused by artificial intelligence (AI) in various sectors. As a result, they are pulling out their investments from companies they perceive to be at risk.
